attributes.action: make m.p's take a 1.9% pay rise, like the public sector employees, or take no pay rise at all this year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think it is a discgrace that public sector employees are to be given a pitifull 1.9% payrise, while m.p.s get rises far in excess of the national inflation rate.

rejection.details: there are petitions on the site already about MPs pay
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
